game.name: Lethal Invasion
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, HDR available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Lethal Invasion is a competitive online third-person game where all players fight for victory. Improve your weapons, skills, and master magic to achieve victory.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lethal Invasion is a competitive online third-person game where all players fight for victory. Improve your weapons, skills, and master magic to achieve victory.
